front.title: Transmission of Flow Labelled IPv4 on ATM Data Links Ipsilon Version 1.0

abstract.t: This document specifies the manner for transmitting IPv4 datagrams over an ATM data link, both in a default manner and in the presence of flow labelling via Ipsilon Flow Management Protocol [IFMP]. This document provides information for the Internet community. This memo does not specify an Internet standard of any kind.
